description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.QsCRXffpsDoMvPnT]{Basic Mods}

One of your droneâ€™s weapon mounts can hold two additional batteries, magazines, or other type of ammunition in addition to its usual weapon and ammunition capacity. Your drone must have the weapon mount mod before selecting this mod. You can select this mod more than once, up to the number of weapon mounts the drone has.
